Effect.en: Each player reveals 1 face-down card in their Extra Deck, if both cards are of the same monster card type (Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link), send that opponent's card to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon your card, then if both cards have the same original Type and Attribute, your opponent loses LP equal to their card's ATK. Otherwise, send your card to the GY, and if you do, your opponent Special Summons their card. You can only activate 1 "Pinpoint Dash" per turn.
